languages.text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.
languages.original_text:
Персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} и +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Заблокировав{/g} атаку, персонаж получает число зарядов энергокинетического щита, равное части {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, который нанесла бы эта атака.
Совершая атаку этим щитом, персонаж дополнительно наносит +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%, после чего все уровни сбрасываются.

traits.locale_text:
The wielder gains +1 deflection and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% parry. Whenever the wielder successfully blocks an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's damage.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} energy damage with 50% armour penetration. After that, all the stacks are removed.

The wielder gains +1 deflection and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% parry. Whenever the wielder successfully blocks an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's damage.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} energy damage with 50% armour penetration. After that, all the stacks are removed.

The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully blocks an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully blocks an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} energy damage with 50% armour penetration. After that, all the stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
The wielder gains +1 deflection and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% parry. Whenever the wielder successfully blocks an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's damage.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} energy damage with 50% armour penetration. After that, all the stacks are removed.

languages.text:
Kullanan kişi, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} ve +%{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değeri kazanır. Kullanan kişi, bir saldırıyı başarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blokladığında{/g} o saldırının {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} miktarına eşit sayıda kinesiostatik kalkan birikimi kazanır.
Kullanan kişi bu kalkanla bir saldırı yaptığında saldırı, %50 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri ile ilave +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}enerji hasarı{/g} verir. Ardından tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
Kullanan kişi, +1 saptırma ve +%{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} savuşturma değeri kazanır. Kullanan kişi, bir saldırıyı başarıyla blokladığında o saldırının hasar miktarına eşit sayıda kinesiostatik kalkan birikimi kazanır.
Kullanan kişi bu kalkanla bir saldırı yaptığında saldırı, %50 zırh delme değeri ile ilave +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} enerji hasarı verir. Ardından tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.

Kullanan kişi, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} ve +%{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} savuşturma değeri kazanır. Kullanan kişi, bir saldırıyı başarıyla blokladığında o saldırının {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} miktarına eşit sayıda kinesiostatik kalkan birikimi kazanır.
Kullanan kişi bu kalkanla bir saldırı yaptığında saldırı, %50 zırh delme değeri ile ilave +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} enerji hasarı verir. Ardından tüm birikimler ortadan kalkar.

languages.text:
El portador gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y un +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}. Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquea{/g} con éxito un ataque, gana tantas acumulaciones de escudo cinestático como una parte del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ese ataque.
Cuando el portador efectúa un ataque con este escudo, inflige +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño de energía{/g} adicionales con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 50 %. Después se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
El portador gana +1 de desvío y un +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % de parada. Cada vez que el portador bloquea con éxito un ataque, gana tantas acumulaciones de escudo cinestático como una parte del daño de ese ataque.
Cuando el portador efectúa un ataque con este escudo, inflige +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} puntos de daño de energía adicionales con una penetración de armadura del 50 %. Después se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.

El portador gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y un +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}. Cada vez que el portador bloquea con éxito un ataque, gana tantas acumulaciones de escudo cinestático como una parte del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ese ataque.
Cuando el portador efectúa un ataque con este escudo, inflige +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño de energía{/g} adicionales con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 50 %. Después se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.

languages.text:
装备者获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。每当装备者成功{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}攻击时，都会根据此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，获得相应的肌肉动力盾牌效果层数。
当装备者使用此盾牌进行攻击时，此次攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}点{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，能量伤害拥有50%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。在此之后，移除所有肌肉动力盾牌效果层数。
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+1偏转与+{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}%招架。每当装备者成功格挡攻击时，都会根据此次攻击造成的伤害，获得相应的肌肉动力盾牌效果层数。
当装备者使用此盾牌进行攻击时，此次攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}点能量伤害，能量伤害拥有50%护甲穿透。在此之后，移除所有肌肉动力盾牌效果层数。

装备者获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}与+{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。每当装备者成功格挡攻击时，都会根据此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，获得相应的肌肉动力盾牌效果层数。
当装备者使用此盾牌进行攻击时，此次攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}点{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}，能量伤害拥有50%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。在此之后，移除所有肌肉动力盾牌效果层数。

languages.text:
L'utilisateur gagne +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} et +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloque{/g} une attaque, il gagne un nombre de cumuls de Bouclier kinésiostatique égal aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} bloqués.
Quand l'utilisateur attaque avec ce bouclier, il inflige +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} avec 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, à la suite de quoi tous les cumuls sont supprimés.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur gagne +1 à la Déflexion et +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % de parade. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque une attaque, il gagne un nombre de cumuls de Bouclier kinésiostatique égal aux dégâts bloqués.
Quand l'utilisateur attaque avec ce bouclier, il inflige +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} points de dégâts d'énergie avec 50 % de pénétration d'armure, à la suite de quoi tous les cumuls sont supprimés.

L'utilisateur gagne +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} et +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque une attaque, il gagne un nombre de cumuls de Bouclier kinésiostatique égal aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} bloqués.
Quand l'utilisateur attaque avec ce bouclier, il inflige +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} avec 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, à la suite de quoi tous les cumuls sont supprimés.

L'utilisateur gagne +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} et +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque une attaque, il gagne un nombre de cumuls de Bouclier kinésiostatique égal aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} bloqués.
Quand l'utilisateur attaque avec ce bouclier, il inflige +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} points de {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} avec 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, à la suite de quoi tous les cumuls sont supprimés.

languages.text:
使用者は、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}+1、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}+{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}%される。使用者が攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}に成功すると、その攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}分に等しい数のキネシオスタティック・シールド・スタックを獲得する。
使用者がこのシールドで攻撃を行う際、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}50%で追加の+{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を与える。その後、すべてのスタックが取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は、ディフレクション+1、受け流し+{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}%される。使用者が攻撃のブロックに成功すると、その攻撃ダメージ分に等しい数のキネシオスタティック・シールド・スタックを獲得する。
使用者がこのシールドで攻撃を行う際、アーマー貫通50%で追加の+{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}エネルギーダメージを与える。その後、すべてのスタックが取り除かれる。

使用者は、ディフレクション+1、受け流し+{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}%される。使用者が攻撃のブロックに成功すると、その攻撃ダメージ分に等しい数のキネシオスタティック・シールド・スタックを獲得する。
使用者がこのシールドで攻撃を行う際、アーマー貫通50%で追加の+{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}エネルギーダメージを与える。その後、すべてのスタックが取り除かれる。

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blockt{/g} der Träger einen Angriff, erhält er kinesiostatische Schildstapel in Höhe des durch diesen Angriff verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}.
Greift der Träger mit diesem Schild an, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Danach werden alle Stapel entfernt.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +1 Ablenkung und +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % Parieren. Blockt der Träger einen Angriff, erhält er kinesiostatische Schildstapel in Höhe des durch diesen Angriff verursachten Schadens.
Greift der Träger mit diesem Schild an, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} Energieschaden mit 50 % Rüstungsdurchdringung. Danach werden alle Stapel entfernt.

Der Träger erhält +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}. Blockt der Träger einen Angriff, erhält er kinesiostatische Schildstapel in Höhe des durch diesen Angriff verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}.
Greift der Träger mit diesem Schild an, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Danach werden alle Stapel entfernt.

Der Träger erhält +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}. Blockt der Träger einen Angriff, erhält er kinesiostatische Schildstapel in Höhe des durch diesen Angriff verursachten Schadens.
Greift der Träger mit diesem Schild an, verursacht er zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Danach werden alle Stapel entfernt.

languages.text:
Персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} и +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Заблокировав{/g} атаку, персонаж получает число зарядов энергокинетического щита, равное части {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, который нанесла бы эта атака.
Совершая атаку этим щитом, персонаж дополнительно наносит +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%, после чего все уровни сбрасываются.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} и +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}. Заблокировав атаку, персонаж получает число зарядов энергокинетического щита, равное части {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, который нанесла бы эта атака.
Совершая атаку этим щитом, персонаж дополнительно наносит +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%, после чего все уровни сбрасываются.

Персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} и +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}. Заблокировав атаку, персонаж получает число зарядов энергокинетического щита, равное части {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, который нанесла бы эта атака.
Совершая атаку этим щитом, персонаж дополнительно наносит +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}энергетического урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%, после чего все уровни сбрасываются.
